long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be careful, this plugin is a NewTab type plugin, which will take effect when you open the browser or open a new tab.

It can help you with the following tasks:

1. Automatically organize your bookmark content in a tree structure for easy viewing and management (including deletion).

2. Prioritize displaying details of your most recently saved bookmarks.

3. For the bookmarks you save, you can add comments. The plugin will automatically collect the page's icon, keywords, and a brief description.

4. You can add shortcuts for some websites, and the plugin will automatically fetch the website's icon.

5. Bookmark search using your browser's built-in search entry, presenting results in a list format. Additionally, you can quickly access web search engines.

Keep it simple, make it efficient.

Hope you like it! Thank you!

The plugin's source code has been published on GitHub(https://github.com/Byte-Biscuit/simple-smart-bookmarks). Feel free to visit and explore!
